Author: helloaveragejoe
Text: First, I’m sorry that you have to go through this. Second. Please, try to reduce your stress. Lots of stress ups the hormone cortisol which results in water retention and lack of sleep. I’m not here to give you the golden idea. Simply because I don’t have one. But I am here to tell you that you’re not alone and we’re here to support you. Please, stay safe. I assume that what matters more to your boyfriend is to see you and love you.
